Ebbro 44192 Nissan Skyline GT-R (BCNR33) 1998 JGTC Series GT500 Class 3rd Place T. Kurosawa/K. Hoshino

Purchased: 2014
Manufacturer page: http://www.ebbro.jp/SHOP/44192.html

Takuya Kurosawa & Kazuyoshi Hoshino raced for team Calsonic Impul in the 1998 JGTC Series. Their best result was a 2nd place finish in round 5 at Twin Ring Motegi and they finished 3rd overall in GT500 class that year.
